Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cli, Gui
public abstract class View
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
It is used to select Cli or GUI view, it set the common variable
Author:
Piersilvio Mancuso
See Also:

    • addController

      public void addController​(ControllerClient controller)
      Add as observer Client Controller
      Parameters:
      controller - is the controllerClient thanks which View execute actions

    • setCommand

      public void setCommand​(Command command)
      Use to set the command sent by the controller that will be used by the Cli and GUI methods
      Parameters:
      command - is the command that has been received by the Server

    • setModelColor

      public void setModelColor​(ModelColor modelColor)
      Use to set the updated modelColor used to compare the color (sent by the controller) and the CliColor that will be used by the Cli and GUI methods
      Parameters:
      modelColor - is the modelColor

    • setModelGame

      public void setModelGame​(ModelGame modelGame)
      Use to set the updated ModelGame that have all the infos about the game that will be used by the Cli and GUI methods
      Parameters:
      modelGame - is a copy of the model

    • setAvailableColor

      public void setAvailableColor​(java.util.List<ModelColor> availableColor)
      Use to set the updated list of available Color that will be used by the Cli and GUI methods
      Parameters:
      availableColor - is a list of all available colors, obtained by the Server

    • setAvailableCell

      public void setAvailableCell​(java.util.List<Cell> availableCell)
      Use to set the updated list of available Cell that will be used by the Cli and GUI methods
      Parameters:
      availableCell - is a list of all available cells, obtained by the Server

    • setAvailableGod

      public void setAvailableGod​(java.util.List<God> availableGod)
      Use to set the updated list of available God that will be used by the Cli and GUI methods
      Parameters:
      availableGod - is a list of available gods, obtained by the server
